original_text: And the east boundary is the Salt Sea, to the mouth of the Jordan. And the boundary on the north side runs from the bay of the sea at the mouth of the Jordan.
korean_text: 그 동쪽 경계는 염해이니 요단 끝까지요 그 북쪽 경계는 요단 끝에 있는 해만에서부터

sentences.original_text: And the east boundary is the Salt Sea
to the mouth of the Jordan.
And the boundary on the north side
runs from the bay of the sea
at the mouth of the Jordan.
